rule.name: AS_ADT_UT_calculateObjectAudit_MultipleObjects
rule.description: [DO NOT CALL DIRECTLY] Calculates audit CDTs for an array of original and new objects

a:ruleInputTestConfigs.a:value: {'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:ADT}AS_ADT_SAMPLE_Parent'( parentId: 1, name: "name", text: "", date: today(), referenceChild: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:ADT}AS_ADT_SAMPLE_ReferenceChildSingle'( childId: 2, text: "", date: today() ), complexChildSingle: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:ADT}AS_ADT_SAMPLE_ComplexChildSingle'( childId: 3, text: "", date: today(), referenceChild: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:ADT}AS_ADT_SAMPLE_ReferenceChildSingle'( childId: 4, text: "", date: today() ), ), complexChildMultiple: { 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:ADT}AS_ADT_SAMPLE_ComplexChildMultiple'( parentId: 1, childId: 5, text: "", date: today(), referenceChild: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:ADT}AS_ADT_SAMPLE_ReferenceChildSingle'( childId: 6, text: "", date: today() ), ) } )}
